item.title: Resources for research
item.description: Here I share some online resouces that I found potentially useful for historical research. The American Civil War Regimental losses in the American Civil War, 1861-1865 The War of the Rebellion: a Compilation of the Official Records of the Union and Confederate Armies The Library of Congress - Digital Collections The Library of Congress - Chronicling America Germany The Soviet Union The Melbourne Gateway to Research on Soviet History
